name: Maggot's Life
description:
*Controls*

WASD or Arrow Keys: Movement

Spacebar: Hop

Shift: Roll

R: Reset position (useful if you end up flipped on your head, or stuck)

Esc: Exit application

Flashing Lights Warning.

Entry for the 2022 GameDevTV GameJam.

In nature, death is only the beginning...

You have just hatched and have only one thing in mind: Feeding. However, it would seem your voracious siblings have already eaten most of the food. Thankfully, you are an unusually agile maggot, with a knack for launching yourself through the air.

Use your abilities to traverse the carcass and find something to eat. But be careful. You and your siblings aren't the only hungry creatures in the forest.
